query.statement:
SELECT A.SEQ AS ITEMNO, TRIM(CHAR(A.SEQ)) || 'Â÷' AS ITEM, SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR, SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.WAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS WAVWR, SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.CHNETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS CHNETWR, SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.CHWAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS CHWAVWR,
(SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.CHNETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) - SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) ) AS NETWR_GAP,
(SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.CHWAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) - SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.WAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) ) AS WAVWR_GAP , '' AS CHK ,A.ERDAT AS ACTDAT2
,(SELECT MAX(X.TRDAT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.PSPID = A.PSPID AND X.DIV = '5' ) AS BUDGET_DAT
FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PSPID = #PSPID# AND A.FINL = 'X'
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
